title: Four p.m. Plumber: Erotica for Couples
description: In this bonus story for Morning, Noon and Night," Alison Tyler tells the tale of a woman lying in wait for her plumber to help her out. And we all know blue collar guys can be THE HOTTEST of all. You are in for a sweet surprise with this lovingly crafted story by one of the best erotica authors around!
author: Alison Tyler
